channel.title: Siege of MoparScape
channel.description:
The Siege of Moparscape.
Moparisthebest is slowly restoring topics. Please don't complain about your topic or post count because it will be taken care of or tough luck.
Thanks to moderators for keeping us informed.
Please see moparscape for more details

item.title: Siege of MoparScape
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

WHO CARES NOW ITS BEEN AND GONE SO STFU AND STOP MOANING FFS

Read full topic

item.title: Siege of MoparScape
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

BobDole81:

I’ve temporarily banned TheBeanie as he’s the main moderator in question here and thus to stop the mass deletions. The issue is that we mods can only really do a limited amount…I suppose its up to the admins to look at post restoration and stuff. The posts TheBeanie deleted haven’t exactly been destroyed, but still remain in a central Rubbish Bin. The issue is how its possible to move them back (which, again, admins would have to look into).

dont u just export the sql data, then import it back into the right table?

Read full topic

item.title: Siege of MoparScape
item.dc:creator: @mrisace mrisace
item.description:
@mrisace wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:52, topic:85703”][quote author=mrisace link=topic=125700.msg1239377#msg1239377 date=1177890986]

then you really need to grow up

And that was really uncalled for.

Well if you think about it, the majorty of the people on this forms are less educated (No offense) and whilst the same with the google comunity…

and whats the point of destroying a forum? its not as bad as getting a server destroyed…

and yet its strange how yet TheBeanie’s account was hacked… or acessed

He was obviously negligent when it came to protecting both his account and computer. That’s all there is to it.

Right… So trying to protect the community by downloading a program to see if it had virus’s on it is being neglegent? Learn to moderate please. Your supposed to help people which sometimes means putting other people first.
Lothy i think you have changed since you got mod. You Used to be ok but now quite frankly i have No time for you at all. Just because you are mod does NOT mean that you have to change personnalitys.
[/quote]

It’s still a responsibilty to keep your account secure. I mean shit happens, but I still don’t see how TheBeanie infected himself. He should have just downloaded it and then scanned it instead of running it.[/quote]
You really think he would off downloaded a suspected file and opened it when about 3 ppl were saying it was a virus? right.

Read full topic

It’s still a responsibilty to keep your account secure. I mean shit happens, but I still don’t see how TheBeanie infected himself. He should have just downloaded it and then scanned it instead of running it.

item.title: Siege of MoparScape
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“mrisace, post:50, topic:85703”][quote author=lothy link=topic=125700.msg1224979#msg1224979 date=1177708801]

then you really need to grow up

And that was really uncalled for.

Well if you think about it, the majorty of the people on this forms are less educated (No offense) and whilst the same with the google comunity…

and whats the point of destroying a forum? its not as bad as getting a server destroyed…

and yet its strange how yet TheBeanie’s account was hacked… or acessed

He was obviously negligent when it came to protecting both his account and computer. That’s all there is to it.
[/quote]

Right… So trying to protect the community by downloading a program to see if it had virus’s on it is being neglegent? Learn to moderate please. Your supposed to help people which sometimes means putting other people first.
Lothy i think you have changed since you got mod. You Used to be ok but now quite frankly i have No time for you at all. Just because you are mod does NOT mean that you have to change personnalitys.[/quote]
Downloading and checking a file for the community is one thing - but actually infecting your computer with it is just silly.
As for helping people, you guys are supposed to help yourselves. Moderators and other staff aren’t babysitters. You should think first before saying such things. You only signed up yesterday, and you’re already making complaints.

Read full topic

item.title: Siege of MoparScape
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“lothy, post:45, topic:85703”][quote author=stone cold link=topic=125700.msg1236351#msg1236351 date=1177856415]

For entertainment purposes, here’s void’s email address, courtesy of thiefmn6092: alisherdude@hotmail.com

Do your worst guys. <3

thats nice…

I never done anything to him.
[/quote]
Don’t be such a baby. You had your few hours of ‘fame’, and now things are taking place because of that. It never ceases to amaze me how someone can always play the ‘I’m innocent, it wasn’t me’ card when it’s incredibly obvious that they were in the wrong.[/quote]
So true.
